verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> Now after this כֵ֔ן <WH3651> this וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> smote דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> it came to pass that David אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> the Philistines וַיַּכְנִיעֵ֑ם <WH3665> and subdued וַיִּקַּ֛ח <WH3947> them and took אֶת־ <WH853> גַּ֥ת <WH1661> Gath וּבְנֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH1323> and her towns מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַיַּ֖ךְ <WH5221> And he smote אֶת־ <WH853> מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> Moab וַיִּהְי֤וּ <WH1961> became מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> and the Moabites עֲבָדִ֣ים <WH5650> servants לְדָוִ֔יד <WH1732> became David's נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <WH5375> [and] brought מִנְחָֽה׃ <WH4503> gifts

וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> smote דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> הֲדַדְעֶ֥זֶר <WH1909> Hadadezer מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king צוֹבָ֖ה <WH6678> of Zobah חֲמָ֑תָה <WH2574> unto Hamath בְּלֶכְתּ֕וֹ <WH1980> went לְהַצִּ֥יב <WH5324> to stablish יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his dominion בִּֽנְהַר־ <WH5104> by the river פְּרָֽת׃ <WH6578> Euphrates

וַיִּלְכֹּד֩ <WH3920> took דָּוִ֨יד <WH1732> And David מִמֶּ֜נּוּ <WH4480> at אֶ֣לֶף <WH505> from him a thousand רֶ֗כֶב <WH7393> chariots וְשִׁבְעַ֤ת <WH7651> and seven אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand פָּֽרָשִׁ֔ים <WH6571> horsemen וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> he רַגְלִ֑י <WH7273> foot soldier וַיְעַקֵּ֤ר <WH6131> also houghed דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> David אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָרֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> all the chariot וַיּוֹתֵ֥ר <WH3498> [horses] but reserved מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at מֵ֥אָה <WH3967> of them an hundred רָֽכֶב׃ <WH7393> chariots

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> came אֲרַ֣ם <WH758> And when the Syrians דַּרְמֶ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus לַעְז֕וֹר <WH5826> to help לַהֲדַדְעֶ֖זֶר <WH1909> Hadadezer מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king צוֹבָ֑ה <WH6678> of Zobah וַיַּ֤ךְ <WH5221> slew דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> David בַּאֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of the Syrians עֶשְׂרִֽים־ <WH6242> and twenty וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> two אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> put דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> Then David בַּאֲרַ֣ם <WH758> and the Syrians דַּרְמֶ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> became אֲרָם֙ <WH758> and the Arameans לְדָוִ֔יד <WH1732> became David's עֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> servants נֹשְׂאֵ֣י <WH5375> [and] brought מִנְחָ֑ה <WH4503> gifts וַיּ֤וֹשַׁע <WH3467> preserved יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Thus the LORD לְדָוִ֔יד <WH1732> David בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he הָלָֽךְ׃ <WH1980> whithersoever he went

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took דָּוִ֗יד <WH1732> And David אֵ֚ת <WH853> שִׁלְטֵ֣י <WH7982> the shields הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָי֔וּ <WH1961> become עַ֖ל <WH5921> were carried עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> that were on the servants הֲדַדְעָ֑זֶר <WH1909> of Hadadezer וַיְבִיאֵ֖ם <WH935> and brought יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> them to Jerusalem

וּמִטִּבְחַ֤ת <WH2880> Likewise from Tibhath וּמִכּוּן֙ <WH3560> and from Chun עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities הֲדַדְעֶ֔זֶר <WH1909> of Hadadezer לָקַ֥ח <WH3947> brought דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> David נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> brass רַבָּ֣ה <WH7227> much מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> very בָּ֣הּ ׀ עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> made שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> wherewith Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> יָ֤ם <WH3220> sea הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5178> the brasen וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעַמּוּדִ֔ים <WH5982> and the pillars וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> and the vessels הַנְּחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> of brass פ

וַיִּשְׁמַ֕ע <WH8085> heard תֹּ֖עוּ <WH8583> Now when Tou מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king חֲמָ֑ת <WH2574> of Hamath כִּ֚י <WH3588> for הִכָּ֣ה <WH5221> had smitten דָוִ֔יד <WH1732> how David אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֵ֖יל <WH2426> army הֲדַדְעֶ֥זֶר <WH1909> of Hadadezer מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king צוֹבָֽה׃ <WH6678> of Zobah

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> He sent אֶת־ <WH853> הֲדֽוֹרָם־ <WH1913> Hadoram בְּנ֣וֹ <WH1121> his son אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> to king דָּ֠וִיד <WH1732> David [לִשְׁאֹול־ כ] (לִשְׁאָל־ <WH7592> to enquire ל֨וֹ <WH7592> to enquire ק) לְשָׁל֜וֹם <WH7965> of his welfare וּֽלְבָרֲכ֗וֹ <WH1288> and to congratulate עַל֩ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> he נִלְחַ֤ם <WH3898> him because he had fought בַּהֲדַדְעֶ֙זֶר֙ <WH1909> Hadadezer וַיַּכֵּ֔הוּ <WH5221> and smitten כִּי־ <WH3588> for אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> at מִלְחֲמ֥וֹת <WH4421> war תֹּ֖עוּ <WH8583> Tou הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> had הֲדַדְעָ֑זֶר <WH1909> Hadadezer וְכֹ֗ל <WH3605> all כְּלֵ֛י <WH3627> of articles זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> of gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> and silver וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> and brass

גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֹתָ֗ם <WH853> הִקְדִּ֞ישׁ <WH6942> dedicated הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Them also king דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> David לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עִם־ <WH5973> with הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> with the silver וְהַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> and the gold אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָשָׂ֖א <WH5375> that he brought מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> from all [these] nations מֵֽאֱד֤וֹם <WH123> from Edom וּמִמּוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> and from Moab וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and from the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וּמִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> and from the Philistines וּמֵֽעֲמָלֵֽק׃ <WH6002> and from Amalek

וְאַבְשַׁ֣י <WH52> Moreover Abishai בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָ֗ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah הִכָּ֤ה <WH5221> slew אֶת־ <WH853> אֱדוֹם֙ <WH123> of the Edomites בְּגֵ֣יא <WH1516> in the valley הַמֶּ֔לַח <WH4417> of salt שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <WH8083> eight עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> And he put בֶּֽאֱדוֹם֙ <WH123> in Edom נְצִיבִ֔ים <WH5333> garrisons וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> became כָל־ <WH3605> and all אֱד֖וֹם <WH123> and all the Edomites עֲבָדִ֣ים <WH5650> servants לְדָוִ֑יד <WH1732> became David's וַיּ֤וֹשַׁע <WH3467> preserved יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Thus the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> David בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he הָלָֽךְ׃ <WH1980> whithersoever he went

וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> reigned דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> So David עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> over all Israel וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become עֹשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> and executed מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> and justice לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> among all his people

וְיוֹאָ֥ב <WH3097> And Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָ֖ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah עַל־ <WH5921> over הַצָּבָ֑א <WH6635> [was] over the host וִיהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <WH3092> and Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיל֖וּד <WH286> of Ahilud מַזְכִּֽיר׃ <WH2142> recorder

וְצָד֧וֹק <WH6659> And Zadok בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיט֛וּב <WH285> of Ahitub וַאֲבִימֶ֥לֶךְ <WH40> and Abimelech בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶבְיָתָ֖ר <WH54> of Abiathar כֹּהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> [were] the priests וְשַׁוְשָׁ֖א <WH7798> and Shavsha סוֹפֵֽר׃ <WH5608> was scribe

וּבְנָיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH1141> And Benaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְה֣וֹיָדָ֔ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada עַל־ <WH5921> over הַכְּרֵתִ֖י <WH3774> [was] over the Cherethites וְהַפְּלֵתִ֑י <WH6432> and the Pelethites וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the sons דָוִ֥יד <WH1732> of David הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <WH7223> [were] chief לְיַ֥ד <WH3027> about הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king פ
